alert.note: Alert for Creek; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 11:40AM CST until February 01 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Additional sleet accumulations of up to a half inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Additional light accumulations of sleet. * WHERE...Tulsa and Creek Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
